document_data.name: ''Beginner's Luck Beer''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite adventurers league/Last Orders at the Yawning Portal|63}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Beginner's Luck Beer''''' was a variety of magical [[beer]] available in the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The [[enchanted]] drink was on offer at the [[Yawning Portal]] tavern in Waterdeep, the City of Splendors. Bottles of Beginner's Luck Beer were stashed away in [[Durnan]]'s cabinet. One serving of the beverage was priced at ten [[gold]] [[coin]]s.
